trait.name: Psychic Defense
entries: While the githzerai is wearing no armor and wielding no shield, its AC includes its Wisdom modifier.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The githzerai makes three Unarmed Strike or Psychic Bolt attacks.

action.name: Unarmed Strike
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 7} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}12 ({@damage 2d8 + 3}) bludgeoning damage plus 11 ({@damage 2d10}) psychic damage.

action.name: Psychic Bolt
entries: {@atk rs} {@hit 7} to hit, range 60 ft., one creature. {@h}21 ({@damage 4d8 + 3}) psychic damage.

reaction.name: Future Insight (3/Day)
entries: When the githzerai or a creature it can see makes an attack roll, a saving throw, or an ability check, the githzerai can cause the roll to be made with advantage or disadvantage.

spellcasting.name: Spellcasting (Psionics)
headerEntries: The githzerai casts one of the following spells, requiring no spell components and using Wisdom as the spellcasting ability (spell save {@dc 15}):
